text:
See the default httpd.conf on Line 45:

# (available at <URL:http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/core.html#lockfile>);

This URL is wrong; the right URL is:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/mpm_common.html#lockfile

Would be nice, if this could be fixed.
creator: thomasb+apache.org-bugs@trash.net
erik@codefaktor.de
text:
I just fixed this and it will be in one of the next releases of Apache (2.0.41
presumably).

Thanks for your report, and thanks for using Apache.
